abstract.t: This document examines the role of the transport checksum when usedwith IPv6, as defined in RFC2460. It presents a summary of thetrade-offs for evaluating the safety of updating RFC 2460 to permitan IPv6 UDP endpoint to use a zero value in the checksum field toindicate that no checksum is present. The document describes issuesand design principles that need to be considered and providesrecommendations.
